trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESNYRSEASHOGUN2014_00147_REDGENERAL_000_000<tab>Heavensturn is a chance anew, yes? I am thinking it is like the game─rock, silk, claw.

TEXT_FESNYRSEASHOGUN2014_00147_REDGENERAL_000_001<tab>The hand is coming up, the hand is making shapes, the hand is winning, losing, or tying. Every Heavensturn, the hand is coming up. Chance, <var 08 E905 ((m'lady)) ((m'lord)) /var>, chance.
TEXT_FESNYRSEASHOGUN2014_00147_REDGENERAL_000_010<tab>You are losing the crimson uma kabuto? Sometimes, I am thinking you are not very smart.
TEXT_FESNYRSEASHOGUN2014_00147_REDGENERAL_000_011<tab>Does <var 08 E905 ((m'lady)) ((m'lord)) /var> sniffle? Another one in your hands, I am thinking, will dry those tears.
